SEARCH
Package ie.atu.sw.util

Interface InputReaderInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsoleInputReader
public interface InputReaderInterface
Interface for reading various types of input from the user. Provides methods for retrieving strings, integers, and file names, along with handling default values.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Closes any resources used by the input reader (e.g., the scanner).
    String
    getFileName(String fileNameDescription, String defaultFileName, boolean checkIfFileExists)
    Prompts the user to enter a file name, with an optional default and validation for file existence.
    int
    getInt(String intDescription, int defaultInt)
    Prompts the user to enter an integer, with a default value to use if the user presses ENTER without input.
    String
    getString()
    Prompts the user to enter a string.
    String
    getString(String stringDescription, String defaultString)
    Prompts the user to enter a string, with a default value to use if the user presses ENTER without input.

  • Method Details

    • getFileName

      String getFileName(String fileNameDescription, String defaultFileName, boolean checkIfFileExists) throws FileNotFoundException
      Prompts the user to enter a file name, with an optional default and validation for file existence.
      Parameters:
      fileNameDescription - a description of the file to be entered, shown to the user
      defaultFileName - the default file name to use if the user presses ENTER without input
      checkIfFileExists - whether to check if the file exists before accepting the input
      Returns:
      the file name entered by the user, or the default file name if input is empty
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist and checkIfFileExists is true

    • getString

      String getString()
      Prompts the user to enter a string.
      Returns:
      the string entered by the user

    • getString

      String getString(String stringDescription, String defaultString)
      Prompts the user to enter a string, with a default value to use if the user presses ENTER without input.
      Parameters:
      stringDescription - a description of the string to be entered, shown to the user
      defaultString - the default string to use if the user presses ENTER without input
      Returns:
      the string entered by the user, or the default string if input is empty

    • getInt

      int getInt(String intDescription, int defaultInt) throws NumberFormatException
      Prompts the user to enter an integer, with a default value to use if the user presses ENTER without input.
      Parameters:
      intDescription - a description of the integer to be entered, shown to the user
      defaultInt - the default integer to use if the user presses ENTER without input
      Returns:
      the integer entered by the user, or the default integer if input is empty
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if the user enters an invalid integer

    • close

      void close()
      Closes any resources used by the input reader (e.g., the scanner).
